long_description: Sling on the fun Haiku Jaunt Shoulder Bag when you're meeting friends for happy hour or headed to a street fair. It's got plenty of pockets, a shoulder strap and artistic graphics. Secure top zipper with faux leather trim lets you access the main compartment, which has slip and zip pockets, plus a key fob. 3 exterior zip pockets, including diagonal zip phone pocket; 2 exterior slip-in pockets. ID holder under the front flap. Cross-body strap is adjustable and detachable. Haiku Jaunt Shoulder Bag is made from recycled material.
short_description: Sling on the fun Haiku Jaunt Shoulder Bag when you're meeting friends for happy hour or headed to a street fair. It's got plenty of pockets, a shoulder strap and artistic graphics.
